nodes.name: Text 2 Video

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "ray-2",
  "prompt": {{ JSON.stringify($('Global SETTINGS').first().json.video_prompt + "; camera motion: " + $json.action) }},
  "aspect_ratio": "{{ $('Global SETTINGS').first().json.aspect_ratio }}",
  "duration": "{{ $('Global SETTINGS').item.json.duration }}",
  "loop": {{ $('Global SETTINGS').first().json.loop }},
  "callback_url": "{{ $('Global SETTINGS').first().json.callback_url }}"
  
}

nodes.notes: This httpRequest node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: RANDOM Camera Motion

parameters.jsCode:
const items = [
  "Static",
  "Move Left",
  "Move Right",
  "Move Up",
  "Move Down",
  "Push In",
  "Pull Out",
  "Zoom In",
  "Zoom Out",
  "Pan Left",
  "Pan Right",
  "Orbit Left",
  "Orbit Right",
  "Crane Up",
  "Crane Down"
];

const randomItem = items[Math.floor(Math.random() * items.length)];

return [{ json: { action: randomItem } }];

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Luma AI Dream Machine - Simple v1 - AK

## Overview
Automated workflow: Luma AI Dream Machine - Simple v1 - AK. This workflow integrates 8 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, airtable, code, executionData. It contains 10 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 10
- **Node Types**: 8
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Text 2 Video**: httpRequest
- **RANDOM Camera Motion**: code
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Global SETTINGS**: set
- **ADD Video Info**: airtable
- **Execution Data**: executionData
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Error Handler**: stopAndError
- **Error Handler for 603f7fdd**: stopAndError

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
